title: Theoden, Lord of the Mark (4P365)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Rohan
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Companion • Man
Strength:	6
Vitality:	2
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Theoden
Game Text:	Fellowship: Play a [Rohan] possession on a [Rohan] companion to heal that companion (limit once per turn).
Lore:	”'Every man and strong lad able to bear arms, all who have horses, let them be ready in the saddle at the gate ere the second hour from noon!'”
Rarity:	P
